channel.title: Opening doors 508?

item.title: Opening doors 508?
item.dc:creator: @anelm anelm
item.description:
@anelm wrote:

how would i make the door open in a 508 source using this code

p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9837, 241, 2);
p.requestAnim(2246, 0);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You open the door.”);
break;

Read full topic
